// Job-specific Values Database
//
// Structure of Database:
// JobID,Weight,HPFactor,HPMultiplicator,SPFactor,ShieldPenalty,Unarmed,Dagger,1HSword,2HSword,1HSpear,2HSpear,1HAxe,2HAxe,1HMace,2HMace(unused),Rod,Bow,Knuckle,Instrument,Whip,Book,Katar,Revolver,Rifle,Gatling Gun,Shotgun,Grenade Launcher,Fuuma Shuriken,2HStaff
//                              SH   UNA   DAG   SWO   SW2   SPE   SP2   AXE   AX2   MAC   2HM   ROD   BOW   KNU   INS   WHI   BOK   KAT   HGU   RIF   GGUN  SGU   GRE   HUU   2HS
